{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Totolink-A850R-1200-RJ45-White-SDL269873808-1-d71aa.jpeg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Long Range Wireless Dual Band Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://totolinkusa.com/sub/product/products/a850r.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TOTOLINK_A850R |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TOTOLINK |model = A850 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = R |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = X7D-IP04268 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8197D; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX5281 |cpu1spd = 660 <!-- 500 / 660 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = ESMT;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/01/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 0E6-00A6-00008 |asin = B011JHZ17E |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AR;RTL8812AR, E5J31P8, GE28; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER;RTL8192ER, E411FP1 GE18; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== CPU ID is not visible in the FCC photos but it is assumed to be a RTL8197D like all other known (non-modem) [http://en.techinfodepot.shoutwiki.com/w/index.php?title=Special:Ask&q=%5B%5BRadio1+chip1+model%3A%3ARTL8192ER%7C%7CRTL8812AR%5D%5D+%5B%5BRadio2+chip1+model%3A%3ARTL8192ER%7C%7CRTL8812AR%5D%5D&p=format%3Dtemplate%2Flink%3Dall%2Fheaders%3Dshow%2Fsep%3D%2C%2Ftemplate%3DES-20table-20entry-20NC2%2Fintrotemplate%3DES-20table-20intro-20NC2%2Foutrotemplate%3DGenTableOutro&po=%3FEmbedded+system+type%0A%3FSupported+802dot11+protocols%0A%3FManuf%0A%3FFCC+ID%0A%3FCPU1+brand%0A%3FCPU1+model%0A%3FCPU1+clock+speed%0A%3FFLA1+amount%0A%3FRAM1+amount%0A%3FRadio1+chip1+brand%0A%3FRadio1+chip1+model%0A%3FRadio1+MIMO+config%0A%3FRadio1+802dot11+protocols%0A%3FRadio2+chip1+brand%0A%3FRadio2+chip1+model%0A%3FRadio2+MIMO+config%0A%3FRadio2+802dot11+protocols%0A%3FSwitch+model%0A%3FLAN+speed%0A%3FExpansion+IFs%0A%3FUSB+ports%0A%3FLAN+ports%0A%3FWAN+ports%0A%3FFCC+approval+date%23ISO%0A%3FEstimated+date+of+release%23ISO%0A%3FASIN%0A%3FWi-Fi+certification+ID%0A%3FRadio1+antenna+connector%0A%3FRadio2+antenna+connector%0A%3FCountry+of+manufacture%0A%3FHas+images%0A%3FRadio1+module+IF%0A%3FRadio1+module%0A%3FRadio2+module+IF%0A%3FRadio2+module%0A%3FThird+party+firmware+supported%0A%3FStock+bootloader%2Ffull%0A%3FStock+firmware+OS%2Ffull%0A%3FCPU1+cores%0A%3FSwitch+brand%0A&sort=Page+name&eq=no RTL8812AR+RTL8192ER] devices.
